mapper.insert: insert into FUND_ORG_LOG_ZX (SERIALNO, CAPPLYNO, CSLBUSINESSNO, CDEALNO, FUNDSTEPNAME, FUNDMAINFLOWNAME, FUNDSUBFLOWNAME, FUNDSUBFLOWSTATUS, FUNDSERVICERETURNCODE, FUNDSERVICERETURNMSG, FUNDBUSINESSSTATUS, CCAPITALBUSINESSNO, BEGINTIME, ENDTIME, LOANORGCODE, STATUS, OLDLOANORGCODE, CERTID, FILEPACKAGE_NAME, DEAL_STATUS, DEAL_DESC, CERTTYPE, CUSTOMERNAME ) values (#{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capplyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cslbusinessno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdealno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundstepname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundmainflowname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundsubflowname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundsubflowstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundservicereturncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundservicereturnmsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundbusinessstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ccapitalbusinessno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begintime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanorgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldloanorgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepackageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SERIALNO, CAPPLYNO, CSLBUSINESSNO, CDEALNO, FUNDSTEPNAME, FUNDMAINFLOWNAME, FUNDSUBFLOWNAME, FUNDSUBFLOWSTATUS, FUNDSERVICERETURNCODE, FUNDSERVICERETURNMSG, FUNDBUSINESSSTATUS, CCAPITALBUSINESSNO, BEGINTIME, ENDTIME, LOANORGCODE, STATUS, OLDLOANORGCODE, CERTID, FILEPACKAGE_NAME, DEAL_STATUS, DEAL_DESC, CERTTYPE, CUSTOMERNAME from FUND_ORG_LOG_ZX where SERIALNO = #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SERIALNO, CAPPLYNO, CSLBUSINESSNO, CDEALNO, FUNDSTEPNAME, FUNDMAINFLOWNAME, FUNDSUBFLOWNAME, FUNDSUBFLOWSTATUS, FUNDSERVICERETURNCODE, FUNDSERVICERETURNMSG, FUNDBUSINESSSTATUS, CCAPITALBUSINESSNO, BEGINTIME, ENDTIME, LOANORGCODE, STATUS, OLDLOANORGCODE, CERTID, FILEPACKAGE_NAME, DEAL_STATUS, DEAL_DESC, CERTTYPE, CUSTOMERNAME from FUND_ORG_LOG_ZX
